unnormalised: Flipkartachi Big Billion Days sale ek *dhamaakedaar* survaat asa, aso tanka mhonnta! Distaa asa, ₹2,000 crores kimotiche smartphones poileach 12 ghantaamni virtual shelves-antlean uddon gele. Mhonnge sumar 13,888 phones dor ek. single. minute. Assume kelear dor ek phone-an sumar 200 grams asa, mhonnge 2777.6 kg smartphones dor minute-an disappear zata! Soglle te kitem kiteant lipoitatt?! Mhozo andaz? Tankamche sarees-antle bhair?
normalised: Flipkart-achi Big Billion Days sale dhoomdhadaakyaan suru zalea, ashem te sangtat! Dispak zata, don hajaar kotti rupiyanche smartphones poilya bara horank virtual shelves-antle uddle. Thoddeshe tera hajaar aani aat shem aattees phones dor ek minuteak. Dor ek phone lagbhag don shem grams asa mhunn ghantlear, don hajaar saat shem sattter point so kilogram smartphones dor minuteak ghum zatat! Konn te pule korun kitlea? Mhojem anuman? Tanche saree khal?

unnormalised: Of course, kainch users claim kortat tankam “discount percentages” tanche board exam score-ank poros chodd dista. Twitter-acher eka zonnan shapath gheun sanglem tanne eka laptop-acher 101% off dekhlem… kaim zalaar tankam *tuka* dita gheunk? Ani moka “lightning deals”-acher suru korunk naka zo 0.5 second-ant vikun vheta. Mhun mazi spectacles ani OTP sodun kaddita tenna tyo geleo astat. Digital ether-ant nasta zaata, mhunjem mazi as ani sopna.
normalised: Khorench, kiteak tori vaprunkare sangta ki tankam board exam marks-an poros chodd "discount percentages" disle mhunn. T-w-i-t-t-e-r-acher ek manu sangtalo ki taka laptop-acher ek shem aani ek percent discount dislem… khorench te gheunk tumkam poishe ditat? Ani "lightning deals" je zero point panch secondak vikun vetat, te vishayant mhojem sangunk naka. Mhaka mhoje chimtte ani O-T-P soddunk time lagta tea vellar, tem pois jata. Digital eatherant pois zata, mhoje aasha ani sopnanche bhaxhen.

unnormalised: Ani magir asa "Diwali poryant delivery" promise. Atam October 6th, 2024 asa ani hun ek simple chai strainer ghetlea. Maka ti Diwali poryant mell’li, mhunjem, Nov 1st, 2024, hun mhoje lagin prepone kartam. Hun tya pressure cooker-achi vaat polloin asa zo hun pattle sale-ant order kelo tho…Fuddlem vors?
normalised: Ani uprant "Diwali-meren delivery" sangtat ti bhas. Azo saun sowo October don hajaar ani chovis asa ani hanvem eka sadea chayechea gallnichem order dilem. Mhaka tem Diwali-meren, mhunnje poilo November don hajaar ani chovis-meren mell'llear, hanv mhojem lagin fattlean ghetam. Punn tem pressure cooker je hanvem poilyache sale-ant order kel'lem, tem azun astanach asat...Fuddlea varshak zait?

unnormalised: Amazon innocent naito. Tanchi Great Indian Festival dista tea poros… "great" asa. Fashion-acher "up to 80% off" claims zori asa, punn tuka tuvem koslinch vastu aawdtali mellonk chodd bhau. Ti either last season-chi rejected designs aasoa vo size ti fakt elves ani yetis-ank zaita. Oh, ani “bank offers”? Mahabharat-ank poros lamb user manual decipher korunk toyaar rava. Minimum purchase ₹5000, maximum discount ₹250, valid fakt Tuesdays-ank donparim 2:00 PM ani 3:00 PM modem…ekaa paiancher ubhe aslear.
normalised: Amazon pan niraparadh na. Tancho Great Indian Festival dispak jata te bhaxhench..."great" asa. Fashion-acher "up to eighty percent off" sangtat punn tumkam je khoinchea vastu favo zatat, tem soddunk tumkam bhagi zaunk zai. Vo te fatle season-ache reject kelele designs astat vo sizes fokot elves aani yetis-ank favo zatat. Oh, ani "bank offers"? Mahabharata-an poros lamb user manual soddounk toyar rav. Don hajaar poishea poros chodd gheunk zai, don shem aani ponchas rupiyanchem discount, fokot Manglarchea don shunya shunya P-M ani teen shunya shunya P-M-chea vellar valid...ek payar ubem ravun.

unnormalised: Punn hey, kamatar kamatam amkam *illusion* of savings aasa, barabor? Ani aami chodd stress-induced shopping cart additions kortat. Tor, soglle brave souls zo deals-ank zavpak zujtat tanka mhojem shubecchha. Ani tanchi delivery tanchi hairline puri retreat zai te poryant yeunk zai. Happy shopping, folks! Yaad theva, retail therapy is real. Except, of course, tenna "therapy"-ank ₹10,000 kharch zata ani buyer's remorse mellta.
normalised: Punn hey, kam azun amkam savings-acho abhas asa, nhoi? Ani stress-ache kartam shopping cart-ant borun dovrunk. Mhunnun, te sabar lokam je te deals-a khatir ladtai tankam, tumchi jeet zaum. Ani tumchi delivery tumchea kensancho rekho pois zaunche adim paauchim. Happy shopping, lokaho! Dhonant dovrat, retail therapy khorench asta. Punn, khorench, je “therapy” don hajaar rupiyank poddun tumkam pashchatap dita.
